data.comment: The match is underway in San Luis de Potosi.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 3, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 6, San Luis to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Throw-in for Necaxa in the half of San Luis.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 9, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards San Luis a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a San Luis throw-in in Necaxa's half.
In the minute 12, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to San Luis.
San Luis are coming forward and Ventura Alvarado gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 19, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Attention is being given to San Luis’s German Berterame and play has been suspended briefly.
Goal! Necaxa have got their heads in front thanks to a Alex Zendejas strike.
In the minute 23, San Luis’s German Berterame is on his feet again at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis have a goal kick.
Ventura Alvarado for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of San Luis.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
German Berterame for San Luis has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
Julio Gonzalez of Necaxa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 28, Throw-in San Luis.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 30, Lucas Passerini is back on his feet again.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Passerini for Necaxa who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Necaxa's Juan Delgado is whistled for offside at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 32, San Luis's Mauro Quiroga misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lucas Passerini.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 35, It seems as if Lucas Passerini is unable to continue. Martin Barragan replaces him for the away team.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 38, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a San Luis throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 41, Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards San Luis a goal kick.
In the minute 45, San Luis are in shooting range from this free kick.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Throw-in San Luis.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 52, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa.
San Luis make their first substitution with Juan Castro replacing Jorge Sanchez.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, San Luis to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Necaxa are pushing forward but Juan Delgado's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 58, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramiro Gonzalez (San Luis) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 60, San Luis will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Necaxa.
Necaxa's Julio Gonzalez breaks free at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
In the minute 62, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Free kick for San Luis in the half of Necaxa.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to San Luis just outside Necaxa's area.
In the minute 64, The home team have replaced Pablo Barrera with Matias Catalan. This is the second substitution made today by Guillermo Vazquez.
At Alfonso Lastras Ramirez, Julio Gonzalez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 66, German Berterame of San Luis gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 68, Free kick San Luis.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick Necaxa.
In the minute 70, San Luis's Camilo Mayada has been booked in San Luis de Potosi.
Corner awarded to Necaxa.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of San Luis.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Luis's half?
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 75, Idekel Dominguez (Necaxa) gets a yellow card.
Matias Catalan (San Luis) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 77, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
In the minute 78, Ventura Alvarado for San Luis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Play has been interrupted briefly in San Luis de Potosi to check on Juan Delgado, who is grimacing with pain.
Necaxa's Juan Delgado is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 81, Luis Alfonso Sosa is making the team's second substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Maximiliano Salas replacing Ian Gonzalez.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In San Luis de Potosi San Luis drive forward through Enrique Lopez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 85, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a throw-in for San Luis, close to Necaxa's area.
Goal! German Berterame gives San Luis a 2-1 lead.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 86, Necaxa drives forward and Julio Gonzalez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
The match at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez has been interrupted briefly for a check on German Berterame, who is down injured.
In the minute 88, The home team has substituted German Berterame with Diego Pineda. Guillermo Vazquez is thus making his third change.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Necaxa's Juan Delgado looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Unai Bilbao gets his shot on target but fails to score for Necaxa.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Juan Delgado is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
